page.title: 09Update on Moor Hall
page.content:
The "Mansion" you describe was built in 1903 by Colonel Ansell, a brewer.

There has been a Hall nearby (in the haunted wood) since the 15th Century and the Old Farm dating from approx 1420 was where John Harman, later Bishop Vesey was born. He built a hall and had 125 liveried servants. He was a great benefactor to Sutto Coldfield, andoobtained aCharter for the town from Henry V111

The "Mansion" is now an hotel The Golf Club is not a part of the hotel complex and is private to its members
